name: BONK - Game Off 2021 jam
description:
Faced with weird bugs while testing that seem to be unstoppable, a game developer sends BOnC to clear the mess.

In this game, you'll have to face waves of weird enemies of all shapes using your trusty bat, spark, and various upgrades. If they get to your base, it's game over.

CREDITS

Programming, music, and art by Electro

btkGlictch shader made by Blokatt

Exporting by Berry

Additional audio by Nintendo

Original idea by Valve
